paper.title: Order Structures and Generalisations of Szpilrajn's Theorem
paper.venue: Foundations of Software Technology and Theoretical Computer Science
paper.abstract: Relational structures of the form (X, R1,R2), with R1 ⫅R2 ⫅ X × X, R1 being a poset interpreted as causality, R2 being interpreted as ‘not later than’ or ‘weak causality’ relation, are considered. Szpilrajnu0027s theorem that each poset is the intersection of its total extensions is generalised to such structures; the interpretation and applications of the results obtained are discussed.
